description.@en: Once I was held, rendered helpless at the whims of others or Nature herself. Now my skin crawls at the thought of containment. I will do anything to escape such a situation, refusing to let anyone or anything stand in the way of my freedom.

effect.@en: Whenever you are restrained in any way (whether by mundane or magical means), you must flip the result to succeed at Skill Tests to escape. However, whenever you are trapped or confined in a tight space, you immediately suffer from Fear.
